m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      News:Archive:2010:May From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search PESWiki News -- May 2010 Archive Click here for most recent news. 2010 June News:Archive:2010:June - going forward in time May Monday, May 31, 2010 Lighting > LED > Affordable, High-Performance LED Bulbs Finally Hitting the Market - Major lighting companies are working tirelessly towards becoming the first to own the LED market. In the next few months, 60-watt equivalent bulbs in the $30 - $40 price range will be hitting
